tests.name: adds
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, time TIMESTAMP) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT id, timestampadd(MILLISECONDS, 10, time) FROM TEST;

tests.name: throws on incorrect type
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, time TIMESTAMP) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT id, timestampadd(time, 5, time) FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Function 'timestampadd' does not accept parameters (TIMESTAMP, INTEGER, TIMESTAMP).

tests.name: adds negative intervals
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID INT KEY, time TIMESTAMP) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT id, timestampadd(MILLISECONDS, -5, time) AS VALUE FROM TEST;
